context: Take-Two acquired BMG Interactive in 1998, gaining Grand Theft Auto rights. Company transferred 19.9% Bungie stake to Microsoft in exchange for Myth and Oni IPs plus Halo engine license.

competitors.name: Electronic Arts
competitors.notes: Largest video game publisher, sports games dominance

competitors.name: Activision
competitors.notes: Major game publisher before Blizzard merger

competitors.name: THQ
competitors.notes: Video game publisher for licensed games

competitors.name: Eidos Interactive
competitors.notes: Publisher of Tomb Raider, Hitman franchises
